fullText: The verbatim transcript becomes a kind of found poetry, with Emily Davis delivering a performance of extraordinary precision and emotional complexity as Reality Winner.
dtliExcerpt: The verbatim transcript becomes a kind of found poetry, with Emily Davis delivering a performance of extraordinary precision and emotional complexity as Reality Winner.
bwwExcerpt: How does mind-numbing banality become heart-racing excitement? In 'Is This a Room,' the transcript is only the starting point. More salient is the way the production, conceived and directed by Tina Satter, views the document through an expressionistic lens, allowing Emily Davis, in a heartbreaking performance, to make words into windows on a world of interior terror.
